attributes.action: Ask the 8 richest UK citizens with the Queen to pay for Buckingham Palace
attributes.additional_details: According to the Sunday Times Rich List 2016 - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sunday_Times_Rich_List_2016 - the richest eight UK citizens domiciled in the UK have combined personal wealths of £65.45bn. Parliament should ask them, together with the Queen herself, to help fund the refurbishment instead as a gesture of goodwill to the nation, demonstrating a commitment that we really are all in this together.
attributes.background: The repairs required to make Buckingham Palace safe have been quoted at £369m. Whilst a small amount in the scheme of the overall UK budget, it is obscene that the taxpayer should fund this at the same time as cuts to essential public services.

rejection.details:
